title: Betsy's Wedding
description: Betsy returns from Europe to marry her true love Joe Willardâ€”and learns that keeping house is more complicated than she'd expected! Betsy, Joe, and their wonderful circle of family and friends are back along with some new characters. WWI looms on the horizon, but this book ends happily with one more very special event back in Deep Valley, a fitting conclusion to this warm and wonderful series.
author: Maud Hart Lovelace
